description:
Nejiru and Chigiru enjoy all-you-can-eat ice cream, and end up with terrible cavities. Miraculously, they just happen to receive a flyer from a dentist`s office the next day. But when they arrive at the "Dental Cattlinic" run by Dentaurus, they get drawn into an adventure involving shady scams, miniaturized drill tanks, and tooth-dwelling alien invaders!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Brush Your Teeth! Beef, Runaway Cavities!
ハミガキしようぜ 牛肉, ミソッパ!
